entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
